We refer to Wikipedia articles on chemistry for help. In GChemPaint, when we create a wedge hash by clicking on the bond and then selecting “Wedge” from the toolbar, it follows the usual wedge convention if the “Invert wedge hashes” option in the preferences is checked.

Therefore, the answer is (A).
